participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, enjoys creative pursuits and has a love for animals.
participant_1.background: I like to go on websites about cats and fashion. My parents met at Woodstock. I always make time for a good anime before work, and I always pack a banana for my morning run. I had to drop out of college to help with my grandparents. I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys social interactions and has a caring nature.
participant_2.background: I feed my dog before I do anything else. Sometimes, I sit by strangers on the subway and strike up a conversation. I work as a meeting coordinator. I want to take my uniform off and relax. My mother is a teacher.

content.text: Hey there, how was your day?
My day was good, thanks! How was yours?
It was pretty good! I went for a run in the morning, and then I hung out with my cats for a while.
I love cats! I have a dog, and he's my best friend.
Aw, that's sweet! What kind of dog do you have?
He's a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their fluffy coats.
I know, right? They're the best.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, biking, and swimming. I also like to play video games.
That's cool. I like to go hiking and biking too. I also like to read and watch movies.
I love to read! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I really like the Harry Potter series.
Oh, I love Harry Potter! That's a great series.
Yeah, it is! I'm excited for the new movie.
Me too! I'm going to see it on opening night.
I'm jealous! I don't think I'm going to be able to make it to the theater on opening night.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm sure it will be a great movie.
I'm sure it will be too. I'll have to catch it later.
You definitely should!
